text: David Barefoot is a paralympic athlete from Canada competing mainly in category C1 events. David competed in the 1984 Summer Paralympics in archery, athletics and boccia. In Archery he won the gold in Men's Double FITA Round C1. ==References== Category:Paralympic archers of Canada Category:Paralympic track and field athletes of Canada Category:Paralympic boccia players of Canada Category:Archers at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Boccia players at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Canada Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Canadian male archers Category:Medalists at the 1984 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in archery
title: David Barefoot
